title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2527.11 - Advisory opinions and Operational Bulletins
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2527.11 - Advisory opinions and Operational Bulletins

State Regulations
(a) The DHCR may render advisory opinions as
to the DHCR's interpretation of the RSL, this Code or procedures, on the DHCR's
own initiative or at the request of a party. (b) In addition to the advisory opinion
issued under subdivision (a) of this section, the DHCR may take such other
required and appropriate action as it deems necessary for the timely
implementation of the RSL and this Code, and for the preservation of regulated
rental housing in accordance with section
2520.3
of this Title. Such other
action may include the issuance and updating of schedules, forms, instructions, and the official interpretative opinions and explanatory statements of general
policy of the commissioner, including operational bulletins, with respect to
the RSL and this Code. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2527.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
